str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Nourishment, food. From a compound of dia and trepho; nourishment.
Clothing, a covering, raiment. From a derivative of skepas; clothing.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To keep off, assist; I suffice; pass: To be satisfied. Apparently a primary verb; properly, to ward off, i.e. to avail.
